page.title: 15Comments on Chelmsley Wood
page.content: The following is a summary of the comments made by 11 year old children who live on Chelmsley Wood. Some disliked certain areas because of: graffiti on walls; broken glass and rubbish left scattered on the floor; no places to play(if you play outside houses you risked being moaned at). The places most liked were: Meriden Park with its wood, swings, a slide and a lake with swans and other birds on it; the BMX track; the Solihull Sports Centre because you can do running, weight lifting and football there; Kinghurst Lake because you can fish in it; the library which is nice and quiet to go to and sit and read a book or draw a picture.
